entry.summary: ...WINTER STORM TO IMPACT TRAVEL TONIGHT INTO FRIDAY MORNING... .A winter storm will bring an accumulating snowfall to the area tonight into Friday morning. The heaviest snowfall will occur this evening and overnight with the highest totals south of Highway 29.
